title: Valkyrie Gets Approval to Start Buying ETH Futures For its Existing Bitcoin ETF
description: The fund's new strategy to combine ether and bitcoin will be effective formally on Oct. 3.

title: Fortress CEO Responds to Ripple Backing Out of Acquisition
description: Fortress CEO Scott Purcell said Ripple wants to stick with its current B2B focus.

title: Meta AI Assistant Launches to Compete With Chatbots Like Chatgpt
description: Meta Platforms, the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, launched its own chatbot based on artificial intelligence (AI) technology. title: Swiss Bank Hypothekarbank Lenzburg Joins SDX Crypto Exchange
description: In a significant move within the world of digital assets, Hypothekarbank Lenzburg, a prominent regional Swiss bank boasting assets exceeding $7 billion, has announced its membership in the Six Digital Exchange (SDX). This development marks the sixth Swiss bank to join the SDX, a blockchain-based platform for the trading of digital securities. The other Swiss ... Read more

title: FTX boss to remain in prison ahead of October trial
description: Bankman-Fried's request for temporary release from prison was denied by a New York court just days before his FTX trial begins in October
